channel.title: Love to Code? --- Programmers Wanted Inside!
channel.description:
If you look at www.nextg3n.com, you will see exactly why I am posting this here.
I am looking, once again, for a lead programmer to construct a "bot". You have to be very serious about the project, I do not want another dcthugs on my hands, and you have to fully complete the project from beginning to end.
You have full control of the project from the coding perspective, you can do whatever you like with the project, add features, delete features, etc, etc, you do not have to ask permission from me to alter the program.
I figure that now with the release of a public deobber, and more tools becoming publicly available, that the job is only getting easier for the programmers, so it shouldnt be as hard as when dcthugs was initially attempting to do this as it will be for you.
Upon completion, I will require the full source code, and full rights to the program. I will work out the payment scheme with you when that time comes.
If you are interested, contact me through a PM here, or post here, either will work. I will give you my MSN contact details as soon as that happens.
Thanks for looking, and I hope that you can help me out :) -HDKilla

item.title: Love to Code? --- Programmers Wanted Inside!
item.dc:creator: @ghostboy195 ghostboy195
item.description:
@ghostboy195 wrote:

lol, Mr.Chris wears a bowler hat

Read full topic

item.title: Love to Code? --- Programmers Wanted Inside!
item.dc:creator: @hdkilla HDKilla
item.description:
@hdkilla wrote:

NOURLOL:

Don’t hurt me when I run away with your deposit.

Ok, this isnt going anywhere, and I also realise that you love to toy with people when you know you have some form of “power”.

Ill leave it at this, you can either take the offer ive PM’ed you a while back, or we can work out a new offer, if you are willing to do that, then so am I, and if not, then so be it, ill just have to keep looking.

Read full topic
item.source: Love to Code? --- Programmers Wanted Inside!

item.title: Love to Code? --- Programmers Wanted Inside!
item.dc:creator: @NOURLOL NOURLOL
item.description:
@NOURLOL wrote:

Don’t hurt me when I run away with your deposit.

In all seriousness, I have absolutely no intention of maintaining a bot for a group of complete … people, and I sincerely hope that no one else does.

Read full topic

item.description:

Have a biscuit, lol.

Ok…

How about this, what will it take to get you to work for me, besides putting up with the thicket of sarcasm that you so love.

I will totally send you http://jagex.biz/bot_new.avi , updater and all, for 6gp, providing it’s on a lvl 3 character near that dragon you have to kill for rune plate.

Im not paying in rocks for this job…some serious cash for something that you apparently have already got somewhat working.

item.title: Love to Code? --- Programmers Wanted Inside!
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

Mr.Chris:

Hey, rules, do you have any estimation as to when this bot will be realesed? Will it be free or pay to use?

well the bot is done, attracting scripters is hard because i haven’t written any example scripts.
we do have a login random and welcome screen lol

free bot that requires applet on top of screen
paid version with extra features including having the applet minmized

scripts/randoms work on both.

a intergrated script auth system where script classes are loaded from a server, where i take a cut of the sales from the scripter in return for encrypting the classes and having a auth system.

Read full topic

If.

item.title: Love to Code? --- Programmers Wanted Inside!
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“HDKilla, post:18, topic:6982”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=9683.msg106565#msg106565 date=1154292736]

As in the cash, what exactly are you offering, as in what the advantage of selling the bot thru you instead of direct to the public.

If I was in his position, I would like to be known as “The guy who made “blahblah” by the noobs” but the real script writers, coders and programmes new the real programmer.
[/quote]

Wtf…

I am taking absolutely NO credit for programming this project, I am merely funding the programmer. The name to be associated with the program will be that of the creator.

-And to Ruler-
I own the domain/hosting, and I see him online too, but have you tryed talking to him? And I dont want to talk about money for your project, as I am now getting a lot of interest in this, but thanks.[/quote]
yep that what he always does. No i havn’t tried talking to him.

Your getting alot of interest in what a deob based bot?

My project is very close to completetion with many testers. It is a color recognition multi-client bot that implements all awt events. It can run minimzed (not public due to “aryan” fears). It is a bot that can never die. Already have over 6k lines of code done.

My project is extendable with reflection as in i can get,set fields, invoke methods ect.

Read full topic

Hey, HDKilla, I wasn’t saying that was what you were feeling. That is how I would want it to be if I could fund it in such a way. I think it is very credible what you are doing and I take my bowler hat off to you Sir.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“HDKilla, post:14, topic:6982”][quote author=ruler link=topic=9683.msg106539#msg106539 date=1154292427]
HDKilla, i don’t know why you were backing dcthugs with cash, the kid has never paid a dime out of his pocket for webhosting or domains.

As in the cash, what exactly are you offering, as in what the advantage of selling the bot thru you instead of direct to the public.

[/quote]

Id just like to say this first, I never gave him any money, he just neglected to work, and talk to me, or anyone, like I said, he just disappeared, if I had of payed him, I would have gone nutty :P[/quote]
i see him on msn at least 3 timea a week, who owns the domain and webhosting?

you didn’t answer the question.
